text: Ej musrikon, onhoero, ki ƣajr az Alloh mexoned, ʙandagone cun sumojand. Agar rost megued, ki onho cizero az iʙodat sazovor mesavand, pas onhoro ʙixoned, ʙojad du'oi sumoro icoʙat kunand! Va agar sumoro icoʙat kardand va talaʙoti sumoro ʙa co ovardand, rost guftaed, vagarna dar in da'vojaton duruƣgu hasted va ʙuzurgtarin duruƣro ʙa Alloh nisʙat medihed
